title: Can you just fix mmr
body: You are pairing players who are actually trying with players who wander around the jungle going 0/12 in uner 20 minutes. Like ffs.

replies.body:
There's a difference between being bad and having a bad game.  I'm generally fairly good.  I don't always carry, but I do every now and then.

However, I also (rarely) epicly fail in a game, and get "called out" as a boosted animal.  You can't just assume that because they did poorly in 1 game they must suck.  I mean sure, in the jungle it's mostly ai stuff, but you can still mess up a ton if you're tilted.
or you can just get better at the game and stop thinking its the system holding you back

you have to admit though...
players who wander around the jungle going 0/12 in under 20 minutes....are indeed holding players back. 

Even if just by 1 loss.
Even if you focus on yourself and improve.
You still have that loss, and now need 1 win extra win just to get back to where you where before.
And players like this in the lower ranks like Bronze and silver come all too often. and each time they come you now need 1 extra win just to get back to where you were before they showed up.

It's basically like taking a walk around the block. but every 5 steps you have to literally take 2 steps backwards.
5 steps forward, 2 steps backwards, 5 steps forward, 2 steps backwards, you get the picture.

Some people work. 
Some people have lives.
Some people can't afford to play a million games a season. 
Some people can't afford to have to win an extra game cause a troll decided to basically steal their LP.

i worked ( up until last month ) 6 days a week. i could still bet you i could climb out of bronze with 0 effort. i have proven it and riot has proven it before. that was a 60 minute game, playing an assassin jungle? that game should have been closed out way before. there might have been a way to win it there mgiht not have been. but if you're truely are climbing out of bronze 1 lose litterally means nothing. 

side note:

last session i started bronze 4 and ended silver 1
this session started bronze 3 and im still climbing currently silver 2

it isnt impossible, every guide out there and ever pro players has said it about 100 times **_ you are the reason you are in bronze not your team not the game state nothing but you keeps you in bronze_**

Edit: i'm pretty sure you have been in bronze, if you ended the session in silver there is a good chance at one time you were bronze, i have no idea if you have seen what goes on in low bronze but im telling you right now if you played there you would be straight up baffled about how people stay there. bronze is the division were the worst of the worst go, silver- gold is pretty average  while anything above plat is better then average. to be in bronze **_and remain there_** is just proof that you are below average and probably have some glaring issues that need to be fixed

I don't know what game you are referring to, but nonetheless. I am almost certain everyone has feeders. They do hold you back and it is an irrefutable idea. Nobody ever said they were god like players, but I have been in and out of b4-b2. Still climbing. So might want to lose your self righteous attitude buddy. I was sayng brain dead players should be grouped with braindead players.

not self righteous, it is just the truth. its coming from experience, its not an attack on your skill or anything. these are just proven facts.
you are paired with players you label as " brain dead" because you **_statistically_** are on par with them. if you dont want to be paired with them you have to make some pretty serious changes to you own gameplay, once your mmr raises you will be put up against better opponents but also better team mates. riot can only match you based on what they system says people in diamond feed and troll just like any other division. thinking that mmr is the reason behind this is baseless and untrue.

come back at me with facts, arguments, or something other wise constructive before you scream close minded :)

real close minded people run away from a discussion because they are willing to lay out a proper argument to bother to change an opinion nor are willing to have there change

but thats none of my business 

liptontea.jpg
When did i say it was? I think I am not the only one saying mmr is a bit extreme atm

you mean to tell me you came to the board you complain about **_someone elses ranked climb?_** ? i think not.  the same time you made this post you lost a game with a feeding garen. your MMR is on a similar level with his for a reason.
